entry.def: A portraitist is an artist who paints or draws people's portraits.

means.word_mean: 1. a painter or drawer of portraits

auth_sentence.content: Reynolds started his career as an apprentice to the portraitist Thomas Hudson.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reynolds started his career as an apprentice to the portraitist Thomas Hudson.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reynolds started his career as an apprentice to the portraitist Thomas Hudson.

auth_sentence.content: One renowned portraitist even went so far as to describe it as flatulent.

auth_sentence.content: When looking for a portraitist, consider the artist's style and preferred medium.
